name: GateKeeper
short: A sophisticated security system for protecting your Discord server! ðŸ”’
description:
GateKeeper provides an advanced verification system that requires new members to be vouched for before gaining access to your server. Features include:

- Customizable vouch requirements
- Admin super-vouching
- Auto-removal of unverified members
- Blacklist system
- Verification statistics
- Beautiful embedded messages
- Comprehensive logging
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs for verification history and blacklist purposes. This data can be removed using Discord's built-in leave server function or by being unverified/unblacklisted by an admin.
install_msg: Thanks for installing GateKeeper! ðŸ˜º Get started with `[p]gatekeeper setup`. For help, use `[p]help GateKeeper`.
author: DevelopmentCats
